title: Super hotel - but see my notes
text:
In total a super nice hotel ... as expected since the hotel is among the top-10 most expensive hotels in NYC.
Here is my notes regarding the hotel.
INTERNET PAYMENT!!
To pay to use the internet in a five star hotel in 2017 is simply NOT ok. Why dont you also charge for hot water? On a positive note, the WI-FI coverage is super, even in the spa.
MINIBAR WITH SENSORS
The minibar has automatic sensors that make you pay if you remove items for more than 30 sek. Totally a thing most three-star hotels wouldnt install.
PAPER
Newspaper delivered to the door every morning is super nice.
ICE
Automatically refill of icecubes in the room every day is a nice feature.
ELEVATOR SECURITY
I noticed that the elevator wants a doorkey in order to stop at your exact floor. It is NOT enough that one person in the elevator has a key. A nice security-feature!
NOT DIRECT VIEW
We paid extra for Central Park View. We got the view but please note that the Trump building stands between you and the park (see picture) This is conviently NOT shown in the hotel-pictures.
